fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone to see if they are a Hitperson.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role can only spawn if (819) Hitman, (3027) Hitwoman, or (3028) Hitnonbinaryperson is in the game, and all of these fall under "Hitperson". You will always have the Hitperson as a target.
- If you visit the Hitperson, you will attack them.
- If you kill the Hitperson, players no longer need to kill their target to win.
